author: Ninja_Bricks_
title: Really great for what it is
review: This set is fantastic for its size and price. It's great for kids to play with, but also looks good on my shelf. I would've loved to play with this set as a kid. It has a nice colour scheme, fitting with Zane's colors. The enemy is a nice addition, but nothing to write home about. Same snake we get in all the other Core sets. Very solid mech. Totally worth the price.
